forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Mostly sunny, with a high near 38. West southwest wind around 24 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 20, with temperatures rising to around 24 overnight. West wind 10 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 47 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible.

forecast.shortForecast: Scattered Snow Showers then Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered snow showers before 7am, then a chance of snow. Mostly cloudy. High near 35, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 50%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

sections.content: Bucks Run 2.5 km ski trail will be groomed for skate and classic skiing today, January 27, 2025. There is an additional $5 daily trail fee for the use of Bucks Run or annual permits are available for $125.  Dogs and walkers are not permitted on our groomed trails.

sections.header: Natural Snow Classic and Skate Ski Trails
sections.content: – Golf course trails, Hawk Hills and Coyote Run, were rolled on January 24, 2025.  When skiing the golf course trails please ski on designated marked trails only.  All other trails have not been groomed due to very limited snowfall.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Open this weekend January 25th and 26th from 10 a.m. until 5 p.m. (final rental at 4 p.m.) Ski rentals can be booked ahead https://www.metroparks.com/stony-creek-metropark/#cross-country_skiing.  Trails will not be groomed at this time.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Classic skied golf course trails from 1-2:30pm.  They were holding up surprisingly well. Rolling it recently has helped if stay solid.  A few spots where you may want to detour off the trails but generally good coverage, but thin.  Even some decent skier tracks to follow for a good portion.  Tomorrow morning should be some decent crust skiing.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: The Nubs upper loops are in great  shape with a fresh big groom this morning. LF 7 was the perfect wax of today .

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are open and in great shape with a classic track set. Trails were groomed on Sunday and will be groomed again tomorrow following the wind today.
nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday through Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 PM.
nubsNob.comments: The wind is up today from the Southwest today. Snow conditions continue to be very good. Expect to encounter some drifts around the ski area today. We are hosting a middle school ski meet on Birch Run this afternoon. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
